description:
Python 3.7 will ship with a new module called "dataclasses", which has
been defined in PEP 557.

-  What is this module?
-  What are the problems that PEP 557 authors try to solve?
-  What was the chosen design, and why?
-  How does it compare against the tools that already exist?

This talk will deeply cover "dataclasses", but also "attrs", "box",
"thingy", and others.
title: PEP 557 versus the world
